statements: UPDATE service_tickets SET customer_name='John Doe', status='InProgress' WHERE ticket_id=101;
UPDATE service_tickets SET resolution_details='Issue resolved', status='Closed', issue_description='Software Update' WHERE ticket_id=102;
UPDATE service_tickets SET status = 'InProgress', resolution_details = 'Work in progress' WHERE ticket_id = 101;
UPDATE service_tickets SET issue_description = 'Network connectivity issue', status = 'Resolved' WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE service_tickets SET status='Closed' WHERE ticket_id=101;
UPDATE ticket_updates SET update_description='Issue resolved. Closing ticket.' WHERE ticket_id=101;
UPDATE service_tickets SET status = 'In Progress', resolution_details = 'Working on it' WHERE ticket_id = 1001;
UPDATE ticket_updates SET update_description = 'Added new note', updated_by = 'Support Team' WHERE ticket_id = 1002;
UPDATE tickets SET status = 'In Progress', issue_description = 'Connection Issue' WHERE ticket_id = 123
UPDATE resolutions SET resolution_notes = 'Resolved by Technician A', technician_name = 'Technician A' WHERE ticket_id = 456
UPDATE tickets SET status = 'In Progress', resolution_details = 'Work in progress' WHERE ticket_id = 101
UPDATE status_updates SET update_time = '2022-08-15 10:00:00', update_description = 'Assigned technician to the ticket' WHERE ticket_id = 102
UPDATE Issue SET status = 'In Progress' WHERE issue_id = 101
UPDATE Resolution SET resolved_by = 'John Doe', resolved_at = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE issue_id = 102
UPDATE Issue SET status = 'In Progress' WHERE customer_id = 101 AND issue_id = 1;
UPDATE Resolution SET resolved_at = NOW(), resolution_details = 'Issue resolved successfully' WHERE issue_id = 3 AND resolved_by = 'Admin';
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE tickets SET status = 'Closed', resolution_details = 'Issue resolved' WHERE ticket_id = 5;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE tickets SET status = 'Resolved', resolution_details = 'Issue fixed. Customer satisfied.' WHERE ticket_id = 101;
